en: The Transportation Corps in the European Theater of Operations

body.value: One of three depictions of the Effifel Tower on this map.
One of the three depicitons of the Eiffel Tower on this map
One of the three depictions of the Eiffel Tower on this map
Insignia used on Army Aircraft starting in 1943. It replaced the Army Air Force Insignia outlined in red.
Red arrow located in "Period 1" on map, that shows the 3rd Army under Patton advancing across France after the D-day landings
Red arrow located in "Period 2" of the map, shows 3rd Army nearing the Rhine River and Mainz.
Red arrow located in "Period 3" on map, points to 3rd Army crossing the Rine River into Mainz
Depiction of some rubble with the name St. Lo on it.
Red arrow located in "Period 1" of map, showing the 1st army advancement under Montgomery after they landed on D-Day.
Red arrow in "Period 2" on the map showing the 1st army advancment in starting to cross into Germany.
